instructions.text: Acquire equipment: Scissors, 3 small glass bottles, glass eyedropper, measuring equipment, coffee filters, rubber gloves, glass jar, pyrex dish
Take one small bottle and fill halfway with starting fluid,fill the rest with water. Close bottle, shake for 5 minutes, let rest for 1 minute. Collect clear upper layer with eyedropper
Continue with previous step until you have 1.5oz of ether. Close the bottle and place it in a freezer. Rinse out the original bottle and let it stand
Pour 1/8 teaspoon of lye crystals into the bottle of ephedrine and agitate. Repeat until mixture remains cloudy
